long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adding keyboard shortcuts for Podcast webpages, I'll update with new podcasts if needed. 0.0

➡️ Keyboard shortcuts: 
- Play/pause: Spacebar/S 
- Forward: A key/Left arrow key 
- Backward: D key/Right arrow key

➡️ Currently supported webpages include:  
- https://www.thisamericanlife.org

为Podcast网页添加快捷键,如果大家有需要我再更新新的Podcast进去 0.0

➡️ 快捷键列表:
- 播放/暂停: 空格键/S键
- 向前: A键/左方向键
- 向后: D键/右方向键

➡️ 当前支持的网页有
- https://www.thisamericanlife.org
